Smart Toothbrush with AI: A toothbrush that connects to a smartphone app and uses AI to analyze the user's brushing habits and provide personalized recommendations for improving oral hygiene. The app could also track the user's progress over time and send reminders to brush twice a day.

Toothbrush with Built-in Toothpaste: A toothbrush that dispenses toothpaste from within the handle, eliminating the need to squeeze toothpaste onto the bristles. This would make it easier to use and clean, and would also reduce waste.

Toothbrush with UV Sanitization: A toothbrush that uses UV light to sanitize the bristles after each use, killing any bacteria or germs that may have been left behind. This would help prevent the spread of oral infections and improve overall oral health.

Toothbrush with Pressure Sensors: A toothbrush that uses pressure sensors to monitor the user's brushing pressure and provide feedback on how hard or soft they are brushing. This would help prevent tooth erosion and improve overall oral health.

Toothbrush with Augmented Reality: A toothbrush that uses augmented reality to provide visual feedback on the user's brushing technique. The toothbrush could display a virtual model of the user's teeth and show them how to brush each tooth properly, helping to improve their oral hygiene.
